name: Vivaldi Partners Group
overview: Vivaldi Partners Group is a global firm that unlocks innovation and growth opportunities for brands and businesses in a digitally connected world. Vivaldi Partners Group uses its expertise in strategy, innovation, marketing, and organization to identify new demand-based opportunities, build strong brands, create and realize engaging experiences, and lead change through the development of people. Vivaldi Partners Group comprises of Vivaldi Partners, Fifth Season, a digital, design and technology agency, and E-Edge.

video_embeds.description: Erich Joachimsthaler, Founder & CEO of Vivaldi Partners Group, on the impact of Social Currency on Burberry
